category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PCA_enable_authoring
preference.preference_description: Determines whether users can create or edit variant option data in the Product Configurator application. Valid Values: TRUE - Users can create or edit variant option data in the Product Configurator application. This is the default value. FALSE - Users cannot create or edit variant option data in the Product Configurator application. All data in the application is view-only.
